cards.name: Very short time bonus
cards.description: Add 2/3/5 minutes to the seekers' time.

cards.name: Short time bonus
cards.description: Add 4/6/10 minutes to the seekers' time.

cards.name: Medium time bonus
cards.description: Add 6/9/15 minutes to the seekers' time.

cards.name: Long time bonus
cards.description: Add 8/12/20 minutes to the seekers' time.

cards.name: Very long time bonus
cards.description: Add 12/18/30 minutes to the seekers' time.

cards.name: Randomise Question
cards.description: Play instead of answering a question. A new unasked question from the same category is chosen, at random, which you answer instead.

cards.name: Veto Question
cards.description: Play instead of answering a question. No answer is given, and no reward is earned.

cards.name: Duplicate Another Card
cards.description: Play this card as a copy of any other card in your hand. This may be used to duplicate a time bonus at the end of your round.

cards.name: Move
cards.description: Discard your hand and send the hiders the location of your transit station. This card grants a 10/20/60 minute period to establish a new hiding zone somewhere else on the game map. The seekers are frozen and your hiding timer is paused until this new hiding period has concluded. This card cannot be played during the endgame.

cards.name: Discard 1, Draw 2
cards.description: Discard one other card from your hand. Then, draw and keep two cards from the hider deck.

cards.name: Discard 2, Draw 3
cards.description: Discard two other cards from your hand. Then, draw and keep three cards from the hider deck.

cards.name: Draw 1, Expand 1
cards.description: Draw one card from the hider deck. Then, expand your maximum hand size by one card.

cards.name: Curse of The Zoologist
cards.description: Take a photo of a wild fish, bird, mammal, reptile, amphibian, or bug. The seeker must take a picture of a wild animal in the same category before asking another question.

cards.name: Curse Of The Unguided Tourist
cards.description: Send the seekers an unzoomed Google Street View image from a street within 500 feet of where they are now. The shot has to be parallel to the horizon and include at least one human-built structure other than a road. Without using the internet for research, they must find what you sent them in real life before they can use transportation or ask another question. They must send a picture to the hider for verification.

cards.name: Curse Of The Endless Tumble
cards.description: Seekers must roll a die at least 100 feet and have it land on a 5 or a 6 before they can ask another question. The die must roll the full distance, unaided, using only the momentum from the initial throw and gravity. If the seekers accidentally hit someone with the die, the hider is awarded a [S10, M20, L30] minute bonus.
cards.cost: Roll a die. If it's 5 or 6 this card has no effect

cards.name: Curse Of The Hidden Hangman
cards.description: Before asking another question or boarding another form of transportation, seekers must be the hider in a game of Hamna.

cards.name: Curse Of The Overflowing Chalice
cards.description: For the next three questions, you may draw (not keep) an additional card when drawing from the hider deck.

cards.name: Curse Of The Mediocre Travel Agent
cards.description: Choose any publicly-accessible place within [S0.25, M0.25, L0.50] miles of the seekers' current location. They cannot currently be on transit. They must go there and spend at least S5 M5 L10 minutes before asking another question. They must send you at least three photos of them enjoying their vacation and procure a souvenir. If this souvenir is lost before they get to you, you are awarded an extra [S30, M45, L60] minutes.

cards.name: Curse Of The Luxury Car
cards.description: Take a photo of a car. The seekers must take a photo of a more expensive car before asking another question.

cards.name: Curse Of The U-Turn
cards.description: The seekers must disembark their current mode of transportation at the next station (as long as that station is served by another form of transit in the next [S0.5, M0.5, L1] hours).
cards.cost: Seekers must be heading the wrong way. (Their next station is further from you than they are.)

cards.name: Curse Of The Bridge Troll
cards.description: The seekers must ask their next question from under a bridge.
cards.cost: Seekers must be at least [S1, M5, L30] miles from you

cards.name: Curse Of Water Weight
cards.description: The seekers must acquire and carry at least 2 liters of liquid per seeker for the rest of your run. They cannot ask another question until they have acquired the liquid. If the liquid is lost or abandoned, the hider is awarded a [S30, M30, L60] minute bonus.
cards.cost: Seekers must be within 1,000ft (300 meters) of a body of water.

cards.name: Curse Of The Jammed Door
cards.description: For the next [S0.5, M1, L3] hours, whenever the seekers want to pass through a doorway into a building, business, train, or other vehicle, they must roll 2 dice. If they do not roll a 7 or higher, they cannot enter. Each doorway can be reattempted after [S5, M10, L15] minutes.

cards.name: Curse Of The Cairn
cards.description: You have one attempt to stack as many rocks on top of each other as possible in a freestanding tower. Each rock may touch only one other rock. If the tower falls, seekers must build one of equal height. Rocks must be found in nature and dispersed afterward.

cards.name: Curse Of The Urban Explorer
cards.description: For the rest of the run, seekers cannot ask questions while on transit or in a train station.

cards.name: Curse Of The Impressionable Consumer
cards.description: Seekers must enter and gain admission (if applicable) to a location or buy a product they saw in an advertisement at least 100 feet from the product/location itself.
cards.cost: The seekers' next question is free

cards.name: Curse Of The Egg Partner
cards.description: Seekers must acquire an egg before asking another question. The egg is now an official team member. If it is cracked or abandoned, the hider is awarded [S30, M45, L60] minutes. This curse cannot be played during the endgame.

cards.name: Curse Of The Distant Cuisine
cards.description: Find a restaurant that serves food from a specific foreign country. The seekers must find one that serves food from a country of equal or greater distance away.
cards.cost: You must be at the restaurant

cards.name: Curse Of The Right Turn
cards.description: For the next [S20, M40, L6] minutes, the seekers can only turn right at street intersections. If trapped, they must turn around.

cards.name: Curse Of The Labyrinth
cards.description: Spend up to [S10, M20, L30] minutes drawing a solvable maze and send a photo of it to the seekers. They must solve it before asking another question.

cards.name: Curse Of The Bird Guide
cards.description: You have one chance to film a bird for up to [S5, M10, L15] minutes. The seekers must then film a bird for the same amount of time or longer.

cards.name: Curse Of Spotty Memory
cards.description: One random category of questions is disabled at all times. After this curse is played, roll a die to select the category. It remains disabled until the next question is asked.

cards.name: Curse Of The Lemon Phylactery
cards.description: Before asking another question, each seeker must find a lemon and affix it to their outermost clothing. If any lemon is lost, you are awarded [S30, M45, L60] minutes. Cannot be played during endgame.

cards.name: Curse Of The Drained Brain
cards.description: Choose three questions in different categories. The seekers cannot ask those questions for the rest of the run.

cards.name: Curse Of The Ransom Note
cards.description: The next question seekers ask must be composed using cut-out letters and words from printed material. It must include at least 5 words and be coherent.
cards.cost: Spell out "Ransom Note" as a ransom note (without using this card)

cards.name: Curse Of The Gambler's Feet
cards.description: For the next [S20, M40, L60] minutes, seekers must roll a die before taking any steps. They may take only that number of steps before rolling again.
cards.cost: Roll a die. If it's an even number this curse has no effect
